articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland leaves his manager Pep Guardiola speechless after a breathtaking exhibition of clinical finishing at West Ham.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Man City striker on his back-to-back hat-tricks

articles.description: Raphinha scores a hat-trick as Barcelona blow Real Valladolid away with a thumping 7-0 victory to maintain a perfect start to the La Liga season.
articles.title: Barcelona 7-0 Real Valladolid: Raphinha scores hat-trick as Barca secure huge win

articles.description: England are on the hunt for a new white-ball coach, but may already have the perfect candidate in place, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England cricket: Why Brendon McCullum should get vacant white-ball head coach role

articles.description: American Scottie Scheffler takes five-shot lead from compatriot Collin Morikawa into final round of the Tour Championship.
articles.title: Tour Championship 2024: Scottie Scheffler leads Collin Morikawa by five shots going into final round

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper matches his best Grand Slam performance by beating Botic van de Zandschulp to reach the fourth round of the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Jack Draper beats Botic van de Zandschulp in third round

articles.description: American Jessica Pegula underlines her US Open title credentials with a routine victory over Spain's Jessica Bouzas Maneiro in the third round.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jessica Pegula beats Jessica Bouzas Maneiro

articles.description: South Africa overturn a 10-point deficit to come from behind and beat New Zealand in the Rugby Championship.
articles.title: Rugby Championship: South Africa come from behind to beat New Zealand

articles.description: The para-triathlon events at the Paris 2024 Paralympics have been postponed by 24 hours due to poor water quality in the River Seine.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Paralympics: Triathlon postponed due to poor water quality

articles.description: Lando Norris says he has a "good opportunity" to make up ground on title rival Max Verstappen in Sunday’s Italian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Italian Grand Prix: Lando Norris eyes 'opportunity' to close title gap on Max Verstappen from pole position

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta was "amazed" to see Declan Rice sent off against Brighton - but was it the right call?
articles.title: Declan Rice red card: Mikel Arteta 'amazed' at decision to send Arsenal midfielder off
